meanings.definition: The parts left over after other parts have been removed, used, or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists found ancient remains of a civilization buried underground.
meanings.sent2: The remains of the meal were scattered across the table after the feast.
meanings.sent3: The remains of the cake mysteriously disappeared from the kitchen overnight.
meanings.sent4: The remains of the old building stood as a reminder of the city's history.
meanings.sent5: The remains of the shipwreck were visible just below the surface of the water.

meanings.definition: The body of a deceased person.
meanings.sent1: The family gathered to mourn the remains of their loved one at the funeral.
meanings.sent2: The cemetery was filled with the remains of those who had passed away.
meanings.sent3: The ghostly figure claimed to be the remains of a former pirate captain.
meanings.sent4: The remains of the ancient pharaoh were carefully preserved in the tomb.
meanings.sent5: The forensic team examined the remains to determine the cause of death.

meanings.definition: To continue to exist or be left after other parts have been removed or used.
meanings.sent1: The old castle remains a popular tourist attraction despite its age.
meanings.sent2: After the storm passed, only a few scattered clouds remains in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mystery novel remains unfinished as the author struggles for inspiration.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness remains a beacon of light in a world filled with darkness.
meanings.sent5: The memory of their laughter remains etched in my mind.
